message: Starting course structure mapping - will read all 11 PDF text files and create comprehensive mapping
Read 3/11 PDFs (Introduction, Theoretical Approaches, Learning). Extracting course structure: 2 midterms 30% each (weeks 7, 12), final 40%. Continuing with remaining PDFs.
Completed reading all 11 PDF text files. Creating comprehensive course structure mapping document with week-to-topic mapping, assessment structure, and consolidation of peer findings.

MISSION ACCOMPLISHED: Successfully completed comprehensive course structure mapping and peer findings consolidation. Deliverables: (1) Read all 11 PDF text files covering weeks 1-13 of PSYC100, (2) Created master mapping document with week-to-topic correspondence, date ranges, and PDF sources, (3) Extracted complete assessment structure (2 midterms 30% each, final 40%), (4) Documented overall learning objectives across all topics, (5) Consolidated findings from 6 peer content analyst agents, (6) Created completeness checklist verifying 100% coverage of all 11 content weeks, (7) Provided Phase 2 implementation recommendations. Master document saved: PHASE1_COURSE_STRUCTURE_COMPREHENSIVE_MAPPING.md (24KB, 7 major sections). This serves as authoritative reference for Phase 2 JSON content generation.
